rev.comment: /* Statements regarding President Barack Obama */ see talk for justification
rev.diff:
Line 258: Line 258:
On April 27, 2011, Obama provided the 'long form' birth certificate to the press. An image of the birth certificate, which confirmed details that were provided in 2008 on the short-form certification, was posted on the whitehouse.gov website.<ref>[http://www.whitehouse.gov/sites/default/files/rss_viewer/birth-certificate-long-form.pdf]</ref> At a press conference held shortly after the release, Trump credited the release to his efforts. In the April 27 press conference, Trump also voiced questions about whether Obama's college grades were sufficient for Harvard admission.<ref>[http://nation.foxnews.com/donald-trump/2011/04/08/msnbc-host-wants-parent-company-fire-trump MSNBC Host Wants Parent Company to Fire Trump] [http://washingtonscene.thehill.com/in-the-know/36-news/9131-weiner-nbc-should-tell-trump-youre-fired Weiner: NBC Should Tell Trump "You're Fired"]</ref>
On April 27, 2011, Obama provided the 'long form' birth certificate to the press. An image of the birth certificate, which confirmed details that were provided in 2008 on the short-form certification, was posted on the whitehouse.gov website.<ref>[http://www.whitehouse.gov/sites/default/files/rss_viewer/birth-certificate-long-form.pdf]</ref> At a press conference held shortly after the release, Trump credited the release to his efforts. In the April 27 press conference, Trump also voiced questions about whether Obama's college grades were sufficient for Harvard admission.<ref>[http://nation.foxnews.com/donald-trump/2011/04/08/msnbc-host-wants-parent-company-fire-trump MSNBC Host Wants Parent Company to Fire Trump] [http://washingtonscene.thehill.com/in-the-know/36-news/9131-weiner-nbc-should-tell-trump-youre-fired Weiner: NBC Should Tell Trump "You're Fired"]</ref>
â
In specific response to Trump's claims about Obama's eduation, Bob Schieffer of CBS NNews explicitly characterized Trump's behavior as racist. Said Schieffer: "That's just code for saying he got into law school because he's black. This is an ugly strain of racism that's running through this whole thing"
+
In specific response to Trump's claims about Obama's eduation, Bob Schieffer of CBS NNews explicitly characterized Trump's behavior as racist. Said Schieffer: "That's just code for saying he got into law school because he's black. This is an ugly strain of racism that's running through this whole thing". <ref>{{cite news|author=Schieffer, Bob|title=Schieffer: Racism underlying Trump's assertions|url=http://www.cbsnews.com/8301-503544_162-20058072-503544.html|date=April 27, 2011|work=CBS News|publisher=CBS Interactive|accessdate=April 27, 2011}}</ref>
